Package kpa.model

Package containing the model of a Kakuro puzzle.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractGroup
    Abstract base class for a group of related cells in the grid of a puzzle.
    Group
    A group of cells, without validity condition.
    Histogram
    A histogram of cell states, counting how often each state occurs in a group.
    KCell
    A grid cell for a Kakuro puzzle.
    KEntry
    Entry in a Kakuro puzzle, consisting of a location, direction, a specification, and a group of cells.
    KGrid
    A rectangular grid of cells for a Kakuro puzzle, with the list of hints.
    KPuzzle
    State of a Kakuro puzzle, without auxiliary solver-related information: the collection of entries, and the states of the cells in the grid (mutable).
    KSpec
    Specification for a Kakuro combination, consisting of a sum and a length (immutable).
    Location
    Location in the Kakuro puzzle grid (immutable).
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Direction
    Direction in the Kakuro puzzle grid.
    KPuzzle.Mode
    The possible modes of a puzzle.

Package kpa.model Description

Package containing the model of a Kakuro puzzle. The class KPuzzle also acts as a fa√ßade for this package. However, also class KCell is important:
  • To iterate over all cells: for (KCell cell : puzzle.getCells())
  • To create a new SetCommand
  • To check whether a cell is empty: KCell.isEmpty()
  • To obtain the empty cell state: KCell.EMPTY
